subject: Verify documentation is consistent
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Ensure all 6 README files have the identical "Lisa Commands" section. Verify HUMAN.md content is still accurate and referenced correctly.

**Blocked by:** Task 7

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`, `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:** `grep -A2 '## Lisa Commands' README.md all/copy-overwrite/README.md expo/copy-overwrite/README.md nestjs/copy-overwrite/README.md cdk/copy-overwrite/README.md npm-package/copy-overwrite/README.md` - all 6 files show identical section

verification.command: grep -A2 '## Lisa Commands' README.md all/copy-overwrite/README.md expo/copy-overwrite/README.md nestjs/copy-overwrite/README.md cdk/copy-overwrite/README.md npm-package/copy-overwrite/README.md
verification.expected: All 6 files show identical Lisa Commands section
